reporting.reporttable.TableQuery:
IF @FromDate <= @ToDate BEGIN SET @FromDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@FromDate,'week');
SELECT CONVERT (NVARCHAR(2),DATEPART(wk,[Date]))+'/'+CONVERT (NVARCHAR(4),DATEPART(YEAR,[Date])) AS '{$ecommerce.report_week$}', CAST(SUM(ISNULL(OrderGrandTotalInMainCurrency,0)) AS DECIMAL(38,1)) AS '{$com.sales.volumeofsales$}' FROM {%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_EnsureDates (@FromDate,@ToDate,'week') AS Dates LEFT JOIN COM_Order ON ([Date] <= OrderDate AND DATEADD(DAY,7,[Date]) > OrderDate) AND OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID GROUP BY [Date] ORDER BY [Date] DESC END
